concurrency.project.ca.cellsandgrids
Class Grid

java.lang.Object
  concurrency.project.ca.cellsandgrids.Grid
Direct Known Subclasses:
CellGrid
public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object

The Grid, composed by Cell objects, with methods to manipulate and get informations.

Author:
Lorenzo Sfarra - Eneina Gjata
